title: Vision & Mission
Prag: To create an excellent, stable and ever-evolving block-chain game; which empowers our community with equal opportunity to earn assets while enjoying a great MOBA gaming experience.
details1: We want our members to have full ownership of their assets and know that their feedback, suggestions and involvement makes a difference in LOP's evolution.
details2: We aim to provide a fair, balanced, transparent and self-sustaining ecosystem where all players are incentivized to play and earn assets.
details3: As MOBA enthusiasts, we are cutting no corners and we are driven to create an absolutely fantastic gaming experience.
